result.execSummary:
The defendant Christopher W Leach was found guilty of the following charge(s) in this case.

  • Possess/Illegally Obtained Prescription, an unclassified misdemeanor, Wisconsin Statutes 450.11(7)(h).

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.

parties.name: Milwaukee County Clerk of Circuit Court

supervisions.descr: House of Correction - Imposed and Stayed

miscConds.notes: Pay all costs and surcharges or, if not paid, convert to a civil judgment.
COURT WILL GRANT EXPUNGEMENT UPON SUCCESSFUL COMPLEITON OF PROBATION AND NO NEW CRIMES.

- AODA assessment/treatment deemed appropriate.
- Maintain absolute sobriety to be monitored by random urine screens/breathalyzers.
- Perform 20 hours of community service.

result.caption: State of Wisconsin vs. Christopher W Leach

records.descr: Records of prosec. are converted data. See file.
Notice of court ordered financial obligations

records.addlTxt:
Court ordered no possession or use of controlled substances without a valid prescription, no drug paraphernalia.
Court advised defendant that failure to comply with conditions of bail may result in an additional charge of bail jumping.

Defendant Christopher W Leach in court with attorney Michael B Plaisted.  Denis John Stingl appeared for the State of Wisconsin.
DEFENDANT IS INDIGENT.
Defendant is advised this case is assigned to Judge Protasiewicz, Branch 24.  Court reviewed the complaint and found probable cause.  Defendant advised of right to counsel and complaint given to Defendant's attorney.  Defendant plead not guilty.  Case is adjourned for a Pretrial Conference in Branch 24.  Pre-trial conference scheduled for September 21, 2015 at 01:30 pm.

ADDRESS INFO for Christopher W Leach
Current: 203 E Glen Street, Crandon, WI 54520   (Effective: 09-04-2015)
Prior: 205 North Boulevard F, Crandon, WI 54520
Defendant is Out-of-Custody. Court appearance in Out-Of-Custody Court, Room 221 Safety Building on 9/4/15 @ 1:30 pm
